question: On a warm sunny afternoon, ocean water splashed onto a rock. A short time later, the rock was dry. Which statement best explains what happened to the water on the rock?
candidate_answers: (A) Heat caused the water to become a gas. (B) Heat melted the water and it disappeared. (C) Salt caused the water to become a gas. (D) Salt melted the water and it disappeared.
answer: Salt caused the water to become a gas.
label: C
